text:
Up to know the visibility attribute is set to true if a usecases as archive  or copy/paste 
are invoked. Applying this patch should guarantee that the attribute should keep its 
value independent from the usecase e.g.  a node with the visibility attribute set to false 
will keep this vaule independent of the usecase.
creator: jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch
jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch
text:
Created attachment 13401
keeping the value of the visibility attribute independent of the invoked usecase
